verses.verse: And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> took his journey <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with all that he had, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, and offered <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> unto the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>: fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not to go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; for I will there make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thee a great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>:

I will go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with thee into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and I will also surely <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8800><s%> bring thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> again: and Yosef <S%H3130><s%> shall put <S%H7896><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> carried <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>, and their little ones <S%H2945><s%>, and their wives <S%H802><s%>, in the wagons <S%H5699><s%> which Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and their goods <S%H7399><s%>, which they had gotten <S%H7408><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and all his seed <S%H2233><s%> with him:

His sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> ' sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%> ' daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and all his seed <S%H2233><s%> brought he <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with him into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, which came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>: Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>, Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> firstborn <S%H1060><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>; Hanoch <S%H2585><s%>, and Phallu <S%H6396><s%>, and Hezron <S%H2696><s%>, and Karmi <S%H3756><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>; Jemuel <S%H3223><s%>, and Jamin <S%H3226><s%>, and Ohad <S%H161><s%>, and Jachin <S%H3199><s%>, and Zohar <S%H6714><s%>, and Shaul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Kanahanitish <S%H3669><s%> woman.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>; Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, K'hat <S%H6955><s%>, and M'rari <S%H4847><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; Er <S%H6147><s%>, and Onan <S%H209><s%>, and Shelah <S%H7956><s%>, and Pharez <S%H6557><s%>, and Zerah <S%H2226><s%>: but Er <S%H6147><s%> and Onan <S%H209><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>. And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pharez <S%H6557><s%> were Hezron <S%H2696><s%> and Hamul <S%H2538><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>; Tola <S%H8439><s%>, and Phuvah <S%H6312><s%>, and I-yov <S%H3102><s%>, and Shimron <S%H8110><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>; Sered <S%H5624><s%>, and Elon <S%H356><s%>, and YAHleel <S%H3177><s%>.

These be the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Leah <S%H3812><s%>, which she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> in Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>, with his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Dinah <S%H1783><s%>: all the souls <S%H5315><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; Ziphion <S%H6837><s%>, and Haggi <S%H2291><s%>, Shuni <S%H7764><s%>, and Ezbon <S%H675><s%>, Eri <S%H6179><s%>, and Arodi <S%H722><s%>, and Areli <S%H692><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>; Jimnah <S%H3232><s%>, and Ishuah <S%H3438><s%>, and Isui <S%H3440><s%>, and Beriah <S%H1283><s%>, and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah <S%H1283><s%>; Heber <S%H2268><s%>, and Malchiel <S%H4439><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%>, whom Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and these she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, even sixteen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8337><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%> Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>.

And unto Yosef <S%H3130><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8735><s%> M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> and Efrayim <S%H669><s%>, which Asenath <S%H621><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Potipherah <S%H6319><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%> of On <S%H204><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> were Belah <S%H1106><s%>, and Becher <S%H1071><s%>, and Ashbel <S%H788><s%>, Gera <S%H1617><s%>, and Naaman <S%H5283><s%>, Ehi <S%H278><s%>, and Rosh <S%H7220><s%>, Muppim <S%H4649><s%>, and Huppim <S%H2650><s%>, and Ard <S%H714><s%>.
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> to Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>: all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were fourteen <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>; Hushim <S%H2366><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>; YAHzeel <S%H3183><s%>, and Guni <S%H1476><s%>, and Jezer <S%H3337><s%>, and Shillem <S%H8006><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, which Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> these unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>: all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were seven <S%H7651><s%>.

All the souls <S%H5315><s%> that came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, which came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of his loins <S%H3409><s%>, besides Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> ' wives <S%H802><s%>, all the souls <S%H5315><s%> were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%>;

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> him in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, were two <S%H8147><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>: all the souls <S%H5315><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, which came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, were threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%>.

And he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%> unto Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, to direct <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> unto Goshen <S%H1657><s%>; and they came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> made ready <S%H631><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his chariot <S%H4818><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, to Goshen <S%H1657><s%>, and presented <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> himself unto him; and he fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his neck <S%H6677><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his neck <S%H6677><s%> a good while <S%H5750><s%>.

And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, Now <S%H6471><s%> let me die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, since <S%H310><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%>, because thou art yet <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and unto his father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, I will go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, My brethren <S%H251><s%>, and my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, which were in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, are come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me;

And the men <S%H582><s%> are shepherds <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H6629><s%>, for their trade hath been to feed cattle <S%H4735><s%>; and they have brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> their flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and their herds <S%H1241><s%>, and all that they have.
And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> shall call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you, and shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, What is your occupation <S%H4639><s%> ?

That ye shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> ' trade <S%H582><s%> hath been about cattle <S%H4735><s%> from our youth <S%H5271><s%> even until now, both we, and also our fathers <S%H1><s%>: that ye may dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen <S%H1657><s%>; for every shepherd <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H6629><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.
